args.new_str:
34    # Context-aware decoding implementation
    35    # Only edit this function
    36    device = input_ids.device
    37    # Get the question part by removing context_ids from the start of input_ids
    38    context_len = context_ids.shape[-1]
    39    question_ids = input_ids[:, context_len:]
    40    generated = input_ids.clone()
    41    eos_token_id = tokenizer.eos_token_id if tokenizer.eos_token_id is not None else tokenizer.sep_token_id
    42    max_steps = 128
    43    for _ in range(max_steps):
    44        # Get logits with context (full input)
    45        outputs_with_context = model(generated)
    46        logits_with_context = outputs_with_context.logits[:, -1, :]
    47        # Get logits without context (question only)
    48        outputs_without_context = model(torch.cat([question_ids, generated[:, context_len:]], dim=-1))
    49        logits_without_context = outputs_without_context.logits[:, -1, :]
    50        # Context-aware adjustment: softmax((1+alpha)*logit_c - alpha*logit_q)
    51        adjusted_logits = logits_with_context - logits_without_context
    52        next_token = torch.argmax(adjusted_logits, dim=-1, keepdim=True)
    53        generated = torch.cat([generated, next_token], dim=-1)
    54        if next_token.item() == eos_token_id:
    55            break
    56    return generated
